contentrichtext.text: {{Non-free audio data |Description = A short, relatively low-quality sound sample from "[[A Hard Day's Night (song)|A Hard Day's Night]]" by [[The Beatles]]. |Source = Album sample |Portion = Less than 10% of the original audio. |Time = 14 seconds (<10% of original 2:32) |Resolution = It is a sample of less than 30 seconds and no more than 10% of the original recording, and could not be used as a substitute for the original commercial recording or to recreate the original recording. It is also of a lower quality than the commercially available digital versions of the original recording. |Artist = [[The Beatles]] |Songwriter = [[Lennon/McCartney]] |Producer = [[George Martin]] |Copyright = [[EMI]] |Other information = This sample will not affect the value of the original work or limit the copyright holder's rights or ability to distribute the original recording. }} {{Non-free use rationale audio sample |Article = A Hard Day's Night (song) |Purpose = This sample illustrates an educational article specifically about the band or song from which it was taken. |Replaceability = No free alternative for copyrighted audio recording <!-- ADDITIONAL INFORMATION --> | Name = | Artist = | Label = | Graphic Artist = | Item = | Type = | Website = | Owner = | Commentary = <!--OVERRIDE FIELDS --> | Description = | Source = | Portion = | Low_resolution = | other_information = }} {{Non-free use rationale audio sample |Article = George Harrison |Purpose = It illustrates a section in an educational article specifically about the guitar work in the song from which this sample was taken. |Replaceability = No free alternative for copyrighted audio recording <!-- ADDITIONAL INFORMATION --> | Name = | Artist = | Label = | Graphic Artist = | Item = | Type = | Website = | Owner = | Commentary = <!--OVERRIDE FIELDS --> | Description = | Source = | Portion = | Low_resolution = | other_information = }} ==Licensing== {{Non-free audio sample|image has rationale|image has rationale=yes}} {{reviewedfairuse|date=01:54, 11 May 2011 (UTC)|user=[[User:Moe Epsilon|Moe Epsilon]]|pages=[[A Hard Day's Night (song)]] and [[George Harrison]]}} [[Category:The Beatles audio samples|Hard Day's Night, A]]
